name: True Love: Confide to the Maple
summary: Guo Hengyi and Yao Fengyi are childhood sweetheart. But their relationship goes far gradually after divided into different classes and the great college entrance exam pressure. Tang Haiyin and Yao Fengxi came to his life as well. An unexpected accident had involved them together. Facing the complicated emotional entanglement, what choice will Guo Hengyi make? Drift or guard his true love?
